ai-tha-ap37:1.2_0: if they sleep like a sage should beamed;
ai-tha-ap37:1.3_0: fervor for the Community of monks
ai-tha-ap37:2.4_0: I saw the benefit of the world,
ai-tha-ap37:3.2_0: Having raised my joined palms to him,
ai-tha-ap37:3.4_0: I saw the benefit of the world
ai-tha-ap37:4.1_0: So far as there are beings in the realm of luminous form,
ai-tha-ap37:4.4_0: It is because they’re included along.
ai-tha-ap37:5.3_0: Whatever living creatures there are in the water,
ai-tha-ap37:6.4_0: It is because they’re included along.
ai-tha-ap37:7.1_0: for this world is the sea.
ai-tha-ap37:8.1_0: With ignorance in the world, there are what are called
ai-tha-ap37:8.2_0: in darkness is strewn about here.
ai-tha-ap37:9.1_0: you all saw all your eyes!
ai-tha-ap37:10.1_0: I filled a top of water.
ai-tha-ap37:11.2_0: together with the Lord of the World,
ai-tha-ap37:11.3_0: And so it is all that was given to me.
ai-tha-ap37:11.4_0: I’m not stuck in the air.
ai-tha-ap37:12.1_0: The Teacher standing in the sky,
ai-tha-ap37:13.1_0: ‘This knowledge has been made by you.
ai-tha-ap37:13.4_0: He doesn’t go to a bad place.
ai-tha-ap37:14.4_0: like the sun rising in the rain.
ai-tha-ap37:15.1_0: both of them (others) and seventy-nine brothers,
ai-tha-ap37:15.2_0: wheel-turning monarch will be successful in the Universal Monarch.
ai-tha-ap37:15.3_0: today you’d see the way of life.
ai-tha-ap37:15.4_0: the great crooks will not do.
ai-tha-ap37:16.2_0: a master of the three Vedas:
ai-tha-ap37:16.4_0: he will go forth in the teaching of the Dispensation.
ai-tha-ap37:17.4_0: he’ll be a disciple of the Teacher.
ai-tha-ap37:18.4_0: he should first place it on the best seat.’
ai-tha-ap37:19.2_0: I’ve cut the bonds of rebirth.
ai-tha-ap37:21.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Moggaliputta.
